deleteAccount.promptText: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and all related data.

changeMail.dialogDescription: Please enter your new mail address and confirm it. We will then send you a verification code.
changeMail.codePrompt: Please enter the verification code we sent you via mail.

unlink.title: Unlink Spotify account?
unlink.text: Please confirm that you want to unlink your Spotify account.

history.empty: You haven't started a search yet.

spotify.dataMissing: We could not load your Spotify data. Please try again later.

recentlyPlayed.empty: You haven't listed to any songs on Spotify recently.

topTracks.empty: We received no data for your most played songs.

errors.OAuthAccountNotLinked: The Spotify Account you're currently logged in on Spotify's Web Platform is already linked to another account on our platform. Please unlink it first or try another one!

prompts.spotify: Connect your Spotify account to see your recently played songs
prompts.wishlist: Log in to view your wishlist
prompts.history: Log in to view your history

magicLink.sent: We sent you a mail with a login link! If you can't find it, please also have a look in your spam folder.

retrieveLocation.error: We could not find you. Please choose the location manually or try again later!

username.error: Something went wrong (Server response: '{{error}}') and we could not update your username, sorry! Please try again later.
username.alreadyExists: This username is already in use!

mail.error: Something went wrong (Server response: '{{error}}') and we could not update your mail, sorry! Please try again later.

mail.loading: Trying to send you an e-mail...
mail.successLogin: An e-mail with a login link was sent to your mail!
mail.successVerification: An e-mail with a verification code was sent to your mail!
mail.error: We could not send an e-mail to the specified address. Please check the address or try again later.

login.error: Something went wrong and we could not log you in, sorry! Please try again later.

logout.error: Something went wrong and we could not log you out, sorry! Please try again later.

deleteAccount.error: Something went wrong (Server response: '{{error}}') and we could not delete your account, sorry! Please try again later.
